title: 🚶‍♂️"Whatever your life's work is, do it well." - Martin Luther King Jr.
content:
Last week I had you implement the sum of n-digit palindromes. Nice work Dale, Andrew, Jehiel, Chuúke, Jeremy, Leslie, Louis, Ten, Cory, Oswaldo, Jaime, Ivana, Jacob, Dan, Austin, Julian, Dimitris, Lionel, Moises, Mayra, and Uzair!Given a number, return true if the input is a factorial of any natural number. Example:

> isFactorial(3) > false > isFactorial(6) > true
